name: ShuFont
author: Orr Afgin

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or download it from wordpress plugins repository.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin panel will be under settings and under the name ShuFont.
sections.faq:
How to upload a font?

All you need to do is in the default tab click on the Upload Here section, and a box containing files in your computer will be shown. Then just go to where your font is, click on it, and it will apear on the screen. If you have more formats of the same font you can upload them too by clicking on the Upload More link.

After you finished uploading your files, you will choose which elements will this font be applyed on. check the elements you want in to be applyed on.

If you have very specific class or id that you want the font to be assigned for, add them in the Custom Classes section. Each class should be prefixed with . (period) and each id should be prefixed with # (number sign). Seperate each class or id with , (comma).

The fonts area in wordpress needs an upgrade, I made this plugin in order to step up some levels and start styling our site in a more easier way. In this plugin you can upload any custom font you want, and then assign it to elements, classes and id’s.
You can manage all of your fonts in a table that contains all actin you can do to fonts (delete or edit).
The plugin is compatible with IE, chrome, firefox, opera, safari. When you upload a custom font, and in order to be compatible with all browsers, you have the option to upload the same font in different formats, each suitable for different browsers.
